Q_DESC:
Software Engineer Dhoni is assigned with several projects from various companies by his Team lead.  He is also insisted to complete the projects based on their Priority. Project order date and their duration is specified.  You are asked to calculate the individual and the average waiting time of the project.  Also find their individual and the average turnaround time of each project. 
Input : 1st line number of process
2nd line burst time of each process
3rd line Priority of each process
TESTCASE_1:
4
2 5 4 7
2 3 1 4
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Waiting time for p[3]=0
Turn around time for p[3]=2
Waiting time for p[4]=2
Turn around time for p[4]=3
Waiting time for p[1]=3
Turn around time for p[1]=5
Waiting time for p[2]=5
Turn around time for p[2]=9

Average turn around=4
TESTCASE_2:
5
8 7 1 2 4
5 4 1 2 3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Waiting time for p[4]=0
Turn around time for p[4]=4
Waiting time for p[2]=4
Turn around time for p[2]=5
Waiting time for p[5]=5
Turn around time for p[5]=7
Waiting time for p[3]=7
Turn around time for p[3]=11
Waiting time for p[1]=11
Turn around time for p[1]=19

Average turn around=9
TESTCASE_3:
3
5 4 8
1 2 3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Waiting time for p[2]=0
Turn around time for p[2]=8
Waiting time for p[3]=8
Turn around time for p[3]=10
Waiting time for p[1]=10
Turn around time for p[1]=15

Average turn around=11
